item.title: Corn Disease Detector
item.description: This project was built as a final group assignment during the Saturdays AI Quito 2021 artificial intelligence workshop. Figure 1.- Logo of the Corn Disease Detector project. Retrieved from https://corndiseasedetector.github.io/. Background Infectious diseases are a major threat for many crops of high importance for the food security of many regions of the world. Each year, around 60% of farmers in Ecuador have reported pre-harvest losses due to infectious agents such as fungi and bacteria, in crops like banana, cacao, and potato.
